DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Nitrite Infusion Reversal Cerebral Vasospasm After Subarachnoid Hemorrhage
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot single center , open-labeled study . Patients subarachnoid hemorrhage admit hospital meet entry criterion offer enrollment study . The patient enrol promptly detection presence cerebral vasospasm . Subjects receive sodium nitrite infusion . One dose cohort plan , 64 nmol/min/kg sodium nitrite ( 0.1325 mg/hour/kg ; 0.0442 ml/hour/kg concentration 3mg/ml ) .
